attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager Bernard van As and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vaal.

The T-Cross 1.0TSI  R-Line is a high-performance compact SUV designed for high-performance people. We believe that the journey should be just as thrilling as getting to your destination. Smoothly controlled by the iconic DSG gearbox.
The T-Cross Comfortline allows you to make the most of work and play with innovative technology like We Connect Go and Touch Screen Infotainment.
